tools.name: todo_create_area
tools.description: Create a new area (top-level organization) for grouping related projects and tasks

tools.name: todo_create_project
tools.description: Create a new project within an area to organize related tasks and goals

tools.name: todo_create_task
tools.description: Create a new task with advanced features like scheduling, priority, and energy level tracking

tools.name: todo_create_task_nl
tools.description: Create task from natural language input using AI to parse intent, priority, and scheduling

tools.name: todo_create_from_conversation
tools.description: Create task from conversation context by analyzing chat history and extracting actionable items

tools.name: todo_get_today
tools.description: Get today's tasks with AI suggestions for prioritization and scheduling optimization

tools.name: todo_get_evening
tools.description: Get tasks suitable for evening work based on energy level and context requirements

tools.name: todo_get_upcoming
tools.description: Get upcoming tasks and events within a specified timeframe for planning and preparation

tools.name: todo_get_anytime
tools.description: Get tasks without specific scheduling that can be done at any convenient time

tools.name: todo_get_someday
tools.description: Get tasks marked for future consideration that are not immediately actionable

tools.name: todo_list_areas
tools.description: List all areas (top-level organization containers) with optional status filtering

tools.name: todo_list_projects
tools.description: List projects with optional filtering by area and status for project management overview

tools.name: todo_complete_task
tools.description: Mark a task as completed and update its status with completion metadata

tools.name: todo_complete_project
tools.description: Complete a project and all its associated tasks in bulk operation

tools.name: todo_get_project_progress
tools.description: Get detailed project progress including completion rates, task breakdown, and milestones

tools.name: todo_project_timeline
tools.description: Get complete project timeline across all data types including tasks, milestones, and deadlines

tools.name: todo_suggest_priorities
tools.description: Get AI-suggested task priorities based on context, deadlines, and workload analysis

tools.name: todo_quick_find
tools.description: Quick semantic search across tasks, projects, and areas using AI-powered search capabilities

tools.name: todo_update_task
tools.description: Update a task's properties including status, priority, scheduling, and project assignment

tools.name: todo_update_project
tools.description: Update a project's properties.

tools.name: todo_archive_area
tools.description: Archive an area and all its projects to remove them from active view while preserving data

tools.name: todo_delete_task
tools.description: Permanently delete a task from the system

tools.name: todo_get_statistics
tools.description: Get comprehensive todo statistics including task counts, project status, and productivity metrics

tools.name: todo_search_tasks
tools.description: Search tasks with advanced filtering capabilities including metadata, tags, and content search

tools.name: todo_get_task_details
tools.description: Get detailed task information including relationships, project context, and area assignments

tools.name: automation_register_workflow
tools.description: Register a new automation workflow with triggers, conditions, and actions

tools.name: automation_list_workflows
tools.description: List all registered automation workflows with optional filtering by enabled status

tools.name: automation_get_workflow
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific automation workflow including configuration and status

tools.name: automation_delete_workflow
tools.description: Permanently delete an automation workflow and stop all its scheduled executions

tools.name: automation_pause_workflow
tools.description: Pause an automation workflow to temporarily stop its execution without deleting it

tools.name: automation_resume_workflow
tools.description: Resume a paused automation workflow to continue its scheduled execution

tools.name: automation_trigger_workflow
tools.description: Manually trigger an automation workflow with optional event data for immediate execution

tools.name: automation_list_runs
tools.description: List automation workflow runs with optional filtering by workflow and execution history

tools.name: automation_get_run
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific workflow run including status, logs, and results

tools.name: automation_get_workflow_suggestions
tools.description: Get intelligent workflow suggestions based on query patterns and usage analytics

tools.name: automation_approve_workflow_suggestion
tools.description: Approve and implement a workflow suggestion to create an active automation workflow

tools.name: automation_get_suggestion_metrics
tools.description: Get analytics and metrics for workflow suggestions including approval rates and effectiveness

tools.name: handoff_save
tools.description: Save chat context for handoff between sessions with AI enhancement.

tools.name: handoff_get
tools.description: Get all handoff contexts from today ordered by created_at in DESC order.

tools.name: handoff_list
tools.description: List recent saved chat contexts.

tools.name: handoff_search
tools.description: Search handoff contexts by content using AI semantic search.

tools.name: handoff_related
tools.description: Get contexts related to the specified context through entities and topics.

tools.name: handoff_insights
tools.description: Get AI-generated insights about a handoff context.

tools.name: handoff_suggest_actions
tools.description: Get suggested follow-up actions for a context.

tools.name: graph_find_related
tools.description: Find entities related to a given entity within a specified depth using graph traversal algorithms

tools.name: graph_search
tools.description: Search for entities in the knowledge graph using semantic search with optional type filtering

tools.name: graph_create_entity
tools.description: Create a new entity in the knowledge graph with specified properties and metadata

tools.name: graph_create_relation
tools.description: Create a new relation between two entities with specified type, strength, and metadata

tools.name: graph_get_entity
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific entity by its ID including properties and metadata

tools.name: graph_get_relations
tools.description: Get all relations for a specific entity with optional filtering by relation types

tools.name: graph_shortest_path
tools.description: Find the shortest path between two entities using graph algorithms for relationship discovery

tools.name: graph_find_clusters
tools.description: Find clusters of related entities using community detection algorithms for pattern discovery

tools.name: graph_get_centrality
tools.description: Get centrality score for an entity to measure its importance and influence in the knowledge graph

tools.name: graph_delete_entity
tools.description: Delete an entity and all its relations from the knowledge graph permanently

tools.name: graph_delete_relation
tools.description: Delete a specific relation between entities from the knowledge graph

tools.name: intelligent_search
tools.description: Advanced semantic search with cross-domain intelligence for finding related information across all data types

tools.name: natural_query
tools.description: Process natural language queries with intelligent interpretation and context understanding

tools.name: get_project_intelligence
tools.description: Get comprehensive project intelligence including related tasks, people, technologies, and insights

tools.name: get_smart_suggestions
tools.description: Get contextual suggestions based on current entity and activity patterns using AI analysis

tools.name: intent_based_search
tools.description: Understand search intent from natural language and provide contextual results with AI interpretation

tools.name: get_workflow_suggestions
tools.description: Get intelligent workflow suggestions based on user's current activity and historical patterns

tools.name: complex_query
tools.description: Process complex queries with multiple clauses and relationships using advanced AI parsing

tools.name: get_expertise_map
tools.description: Create expertise map from conversation and code patterns to identify knowledge distribution

tools.name: get_cross_domain_insights
tools.description: Get cross-domain insights for a specific entity by analyzing relationships across different data types

tools.name: search_with_context
tools.description: Search with additional context about the current entity for more accurate and relevant results

resources.name: automation_workflows_resource
resources.description: Get a list of all automation workflows.

resources.name: automation_runs_resource
resources.description: Get a list of recent workflow runs.

resources.name: handoff_recent
resources.description: Returns the last 10 recent handoff contexts as JSON.

resources.name: resource_knowledge_graph_entities
resources.description: Resource for all entities in the knowledge graph.

templates.name: automation_workflow_detail
templates.description: Get detailed information about a specific workflow.

templates.name: handoff_by_id
templates.description: Return a single handoff context by ID as a dict.
